column2: Demand that your liege, §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!, should grant you a position on his council.
§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! holds your close family members as prisoners. You can demand that they be released immediately.
Has not demanded something in the past 1 year.
§Y[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]§! is currently willing to listen to such demands from §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
